Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement AI Agents: Complete architecture and implementation

This commit implements all three AI agents for the Global Educator Nexus platform:

## Agent 1: AI Screener (Video Analysis)
- GPT-4o multimodal video analysis
- Structured feedback generation
- Profile completeness calculation
- Real-time UI feedback components

## Agent 2: Autonomous Headhunter (RAG Matching)
- OpenAI embeddings for semantic search
- pgvector similarity matching
- Multi-stage candidate filtering
- Claude 3.5 personalized email generation
- Batch email delivery via Resend

## Agent 3: Rule-based Visa Guard
- Comprehensive visa rules for 10 countries
- Real-time eligibility checking
- Application validation
- Cached JSONB results for performance

## Documentation
- Complete technical specification (specification/Specification.md)
- Architecture diagrams with Mermaid (docs/ARCHITECTURE.md)
- Setup and configuration guide (docs/SETUP.md)

## Implementation Files
- lib/ai/: AI service integrations
- lib/db/: Vector search and database queries
- lib/matching/: Candidate filtering logic
- lib/visa/: Visa rules and checker engine
- app/actions/: Server actions for all agents
- app/api/: UploadThing configuration
- components/: React UI components

All agents are production-ready with error handling, caching, and monitoring.
